student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! How are you? Do you want to rent an apartment?
Yes, I want to rent an apartment.
I know two apartments. One is big and one is small. Which one do you want to see?
One apartment has many rooms, the other has few rooms. Do you want a big apartment or a small apartment?
I want to see the big apartment.
The big apartment has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It also has a big kitchen. The small apartment has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. Which one do you like better?
I like the big apartment better.
The big apartment is a good choice. It's bigger and has more rooms. I think you will be happy there. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
